title: Project Planning
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Identify stakeholders and gather their input. Create a project plan with milestones and timelines.

title: Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the data model, application logic, and user interface components. The architecture should consider the following aspects: 1) Separation of concerns between the front-end, back-end, and data layers. 2) Modular design to allow for easy maintenance and scalability. 3) Integration with existing HR systems and data sources. 4) Support for different user roles and access controls. 5) Robust error handling and logging mechanisms. 6) Performance optimizations for handling large datasets.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema to store career data, employee profiles, simulation results, and related metadata. Consider data normalization, indexing strategies, scalability requirements, and data privacy/security measures for sensitive employee information.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for the career move simulator, including input forms, visualization tools, reporting features, and accessibility considerations. The design should align with the overall application architecture and user experience research findings.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the application logic, including career simulation algorithms, data processing, and integration with other systems.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface components based on the approved design, ensuring a smooth and intuitive user experience.

title: Security Review
description: Conduct a thorough security review of the application, identifying potential vulnerabilities and implementing necessary security measures.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute comprehensive test plans, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the production environment, configure continuous integration and deployment pipelines, and automate the release process.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create user manuals, technical documentation, and training materials for end-users and administrators.
